Everything about Python¶

  • Since Python has become the new favorite among astronomers and cosmologists, here we collect a list of basic resources for learning and using Python in research.

Note

If you are looking for Python tool for a specific topic or field, please check out the section for “Specific Topics in Astronomy”.
